112.content:
(You Tsukiumi)

About a week ago, you started to have dreams about a blond girl and every time, she was about to attack you when you woke up. The woman continued to call herself a Sekirei, which you had no idea what that meant. One day, as you were walking along, your heart began to feel an incredible pain. It didn’t take too long to find trouble. In fact, this time, trouble is a female. The most beautiful woman you have ever seen. Then you remembered her as the woman in your dreams She then started to attack you. "Wait, why are you attacking me?" "All Ashikabi aret dirty men." "Look, I'm not the kind of Ashikabi you're describing. In fact, what is an Ashikabi?" You then used your powers to defend yourself. She was very surprised, but she continued to attack you. You used your powers to defend against her water attacks. “Thou aret quite impressive in battle.” “I was just thinking the same about you. But anyway, I need you to be my Sekirei!” you said. She was surprised at this, but continued to attack. Meanwhile, two more Sekirei showed up and attacked Tsukiumi. You jumped in the way of the blast and protected her. “You’re luck he used his own body to take the blast.” one of the Sekirei said. You stood up and said “If you lay one finger on her, I’ll kill you!” Tsukiumi was very shocked with this. But the girls were about to attack again when she attacked them. But she ended up hitting the Sekirei‘s Ashikabi. He got mad and charged toward Tsukiumi. He pinned her against the wall. He was about to unlock her powers when you said “Hey! You leave her alone. She’s MY Sekirei! And I will defend her to the bitter end!” You jumped at the man and punched him away from Tsukiumi. Tsukiumi asked why you did that. “Because you are my Sekirei and I can't explain it, but you have made the storm in my heart calm for the first time in years.” Tsukiumi looked shocked and said “Thou hast courage. Not only didst thou protect me with thy own flesh, but also from that vile Ashikabi. For a monkey, thou are a man of metal. It’s strange. But my heart which once clamored so loudly with protest, is surprisingly at peace now. What is thy name?” You said to her “My name is Sasuke.” “Thank you.” “Look, I know we don‘t know each other, but please be my sekirei. I saw you in my dreams for a reason. We‘re meant to be together, I…I need you.” She gasped a little. “Thou has said enough now. Very well then, the Sekirei Tsukiumi, will graciously accept thy proposal of marriage.” “Marriage proposal!?” She grabbed you by the collar of your shirt and said angrily “You did call me thy Sekirei right?” You said yes and then she said “Listen Sasuke, there is only one person who shall kill thee, from this day forward, and that’s me.” She then kissed you hard on the lips. You began to blush and she had emerged and become your sekirei. She broke the kiss and started to walk away to get some distance. “Excuse me, miss.” "Thou may dispense with the formalities and address me as Tsukiumi. Thou aret my Ashikabi after all, as well as my husband." You smiled and the two of you went to find a place to stay.

1121.content:
(Miya Uzume Minato Musubi Kusano Kagari/Homura Matsu)

As you and Tsukiumi were walking along, you found a pace called Maison Izumo and you decided to stay there. Tsukiumi agreed with you and you walked up to the door and rang the doorbell. The door opened to reveal a woman with purple hair. “Oh, hello there. What can I do for you?” “We’re sorry to intrude, but we need a place to stay.” “Well come in. We were just sitting down for lunch. We would like it if you joined us.” “Thank you.” You and Tsukiumi entered and sat down to lunch. “We appreciate you letting us eat here. I have plenty of money, but due to some circumstances, I have no home. So that’s why I needed a place for us to stay.” “What, you have no home?” “Sadly no. My home was destroyed a while ago, I’ve been sleeping on the rooftops for the last few days.” “Oh, you poor thing. Please, stay here as long as you need.” “I cant thank you enough.” “Oh, I haven’t introduced myself. I’m the landlady, Miya Asuma. These are a few of out tenants.” “Hi, I’m Minato Sahashi.” “I’m Musubi.” “My name’s Kusano.” “The name’s Matsu.” “Hi, I’m Uzume.” “I’m Kagari.” “Pleased to meet you all. My name is Sasuke Uchiha.” “I am Tsukiumi.” “I see that you have Sekirei’s as well Minato.” “You knew?” “Well, I do have some abilities of my own. I can tell these girls are not human.” “Impressive. I bet you impress your parents a lot as well.” “I would, if they were still alive.” Everyone lightly gasped for a moment. “I am so sorry about that.” “Don’t worry about it. Miya, I appreciate you letting Tsukiumi stay here. I am going to train for a little while.” you said going outside.

In the end, she wore you down and you let her have her way. You fell asleep first and Tsukiumi shortly after, holding onto your left arm.
11211111.title: Later

112111111.content: The next morning, Tsukiumi woke up to find that you were not in the bed with her. She got dressed and went looking for you. She found you in the yard training again. You were standing in front of a very large target. You then formed a lightning blade in your hand. You charged towards the target and thrusted your arm forward and yelled “Chidori!” When the attack hit the target, it was destroyed into rubble. Tsukiumi was surprised by your power. “Morning Tsukiumi. I hope you slept well.” “I did, thank you. But why did you not wake me?” “I figured that it would have been rude of me to wake you.” “I see.” You then heard Miya call you and Tsukiumi in for breakfast. The two of you went inside and sat down with the others. But for some reason, you had a very bad feeling in your gut.
112111111.title: The Next Morning

1121111111.content:
(Reaper) (Reaper looks like the one in Bakugan)

Later that day, Miya asked you to grab a few items at the market. You agreed and went off to get them. On the way back, you had a very bad feeling in your gut. But in that moment, you heard something coming at you. You quickly jumped into the air and landed on a rooftop. You saw that happened and the area you were stnding had a massive crater in the ground. "What the hell did this?" "That would be me." you turned and saw Blackheart's general. "Reaper. I should have known." "It's good to see you as well Sasuke. I hear you made friends with what is known as a Sekirei. What is her name again? Tsukiumi?" "If you lay one finger on her-" "Oh relax. My master sent me to kill you, not her." You put an energy barrier around the groceries and used the power of wind to get them back to the inn. You also attached a note onto the groceries to tell them where you are. You took a fighting stance and Reaper got ready as well. Back at Maison Izumo, Miya noticed the grocieries on the kitchen table. "Oh, did Sasuke get back?" She walked up to the groceries and noticed the note. "Tsukiumi!" "Yes landlady?" "This is for you." Miya handed Tsukiumi the note and she knew it was from you. She then rushed off to your location and thought to herlsef "Sasuke, please stay alive."
1121111111.title: Later

11211111111.content:
(Both)

As Tsukiumi rushed off to your location, you were doing your best to fight Reaper. You were trying your best to avoid his attacks, but when it comes to wielding that scythe, no one come even close to Reaper's skill. He managed to attack from a distance and shot energy slashes at you. You tried to fight back, but Reaper was incredible strong. Soon, he landed a blow that sent you into the wall of a taller building. Reaper walked up to you and said as he placed the scythe at your neck "Master Blackeart will greatly reward me for bringing back your head. Say good-bye." he said as he drew his scythe back. But before he could attack Tsukiumi appeared and hit him with her Water Celebration attack. "Tsukiumi, you need to get out of here now!" "I will not abandon you!" "How touching. I guess I can help with that. You can both walk to your graves hand in hand." he said as he charged at Tsukiumi. You quickly jumped in front of him and grabbed the blade of his scythe in between your hands. "I said if you lay one finger on her, I will kill you a thousand times over!" You then landed a kick to his stomach and sent him back a few feet. "Tsukiumi, we need to attack him together." "I understand." You grasped Tsukiumi's hand. "Chaos..." "Water Celebration!" You and Tsukiumi both fired a massive blast of water at Reaper and sent him through the next two buildings. Reaper stood up and said weakly "I will return Sasuke." He vanished into the darkness and youfell to your knees. "Sasuke!" "Thank you Tsukiumi. I could not have beat him without you." "As I said before, it is the duty of a wife to help her husband." You chuckled a lttle and Tsukiumi helped you up. The two of you walked back to Maison Izumo after that.
11211111111.title: Chaos vs Reaper

112111111111.content: A few minutes later, you and Tsukiumi returned to Maison Izumo. "We're home Miya." "Sasuke, what happened to your clothes?" "I had a little run-in with Reaper. If it weren't for Tsukiumi, I wouldn't be here right now." "Well, it seems to me like you're lucky to have Tsukiumi." "I completely agree with you Miya." "Now, why don't you take a nice hot bath and relax a little?" "I think I'll take you up on that offer." "And I will perform my wifely duty and wash your back." "No, I really do appreciate the offer, but I think I wll bathe alone." "As you wish." she said with a slight hint of frustration. As you got in the bath, you said to yourself "I fell a little light-headed from my fight with Reaper, no way I could handle that. But..." you remembered when you and Tsukiumi held each other's hand to fight Reaper. "I could feel how desperately she wanted to help me. I couldn't ask for a better partner than Tsukiumi." You got out of the bath and used the power of fire to dry yourself off.
112111111111.title: Later

1121111111111.content: As soon as you were dry, Miya handed you a temporary change of clothes and you told her you had it covered. You used your energy to create an all new outfit. A black leather vest with three spikes on each shoulder. Some black jeans an boots. You created some spiked leather gloves as well. “There. This should be an suitable attire for battle.” You said as you walked out of the bathroom. When you came out, you saw that it was about time for dinner. You went to the living room and everyone saw your new look. “Wow. Nice look Sasuke.” “It really suits you.” “Yeah it does.” “What do you think Tsukiumi?” Tsukiumi blushed a little and said “I must agree with the others. It does suit thee.” “Thanks everyone. Now, what do you say we dig in?” Everyone agreed and you all had a very delicious meal, courtesy of Miya, with a little help from Musubi.
1121111111111.title: A New Look

11211111111111.content: After dinner, you went outside to train a little more. But you were joined by Tsukiumi this time. "Tsukiumi, what is it?" "Listen Sasuke, I wish to train with thee. So I can become stronger and help you battle against Blackheart.” “Tsukiumi…” you chuckled a little and said “Alright. You and I will start training tomorrow. Right now, I need to practice the power of darkness. I plan to use water against you tomorrow. So I do not want you to hold back.” “I would never do something like that.” “Good. Now I will show you one thing you will learn how to use tomorrow.” You said as you formed a blade made out of water around your hand. “This is the water blade. You will learn how to use this sword tomorrow. Once you do that, a slew of new attack patterns will open themselves to you.” You then let the water blade fall and Tsukiumi was excited to learn how to use it. After you trained with the power of darkness, you went back inside and got ready for bed. Tsukiumi rested her head on your chest and fell asleep after you did of course
11211111111111.title: A Training Parnter

112111111111111.content: The next morning, you and Tsukiumi woke up and went outside to train. “Alright Tsukiumi, if we are going to teach you how to use the water blade, I need to see what you got. Give me your strongest Water Celebration.” “As you wish. Water Celebration!” she said as she fired a blast of water. You called on the power of water into your palms and caught the blast. You slid back almost all the way to the other side of the yard. “Impressive Tsukiumi. I should expect nothing less from someone like you.” “I thank thee for the compliment.” “No problem. Now in order to use the water blade, you need to close your eyes for a moment.” Tsukiumi did as you asked. “Now imagine a waterfall going at such high speed, the water can cut through almost anything. Once you have done that, imagine the waterfall taking the shape of the blade. Now focus your powers into that shape.” Tsukiumi followed your instructions to the letter and the water blade was now under her control. “Excellent work Tsukiumi.” “Thank thee.” But the time of praise had to come to an end. A large explosion came from the city and you and Tsukiumi knew it had to be Reaper. You both rushed off to fight him and take him down.
112111111111111.title: Tsukiumi's Water Blade

1121111111111111.content: You and Tsukiumi rushed off to find Reaper, and in about ten minutes you found him. You gave a whistle to get his attention and when he saw you, he jumped to the top of the building you and Tsukiumi were standing on. “I am going to enjoy taking your heads!” he said as he pointed his scythe at the two of you. “Thou likest sharp things? Then thou aret going to love what my husband hath taught me to wield. Behold my water blade. It is the soul sword that I will use on thee!” “I see, you two are going to be a slight problem. Allow me to fix that.” he said as he split into two Reapers. “Now how will you deal with us?” they both said at the same time. “Tsukiumi…” “Understood.” You quickly got behind the fake Reaper and kicked him towards Tsukiumi. She thrusted her water blade forward and pierced the fakes chest. He vanished in a cloud of black smoke and the real Reaper was impressed. “Now, I am going to have to take you two more seriously.” he said as he increased his power. His body began to gain quite a bit of bulk. He was now much more powerful than he was before. “This will take some doing.” “Come and get me you fools.” “Very well then.” You and Tsukiumi charged towards Reaper and just before you got to him, you both split up and used your speed to keep your distance from Reaper. But soon, Reaper grew frustrated and sent a huge shockwave of energy around him. You and Tsukiumi were sent into the air. But you used the power of wind to charged forward and catch her. “Gotcha.” As you held her in your arms, Tsukiumi began to blush a little and you landed and gently set her on the ground. “You alright Tsukiumi?” “Yes. Thank you.” “Good to hear.” But in that moment, you saw Reaper charge at you and you used the power of wind to push Tsukiumi to the side and used the power of earth to create a cloud of san in order to make sure she had a soft landing. You then grabbed Reaper’s scythe and tried to push him away, but he was no joke in power. “This is getting ridiculous.” “Your head will be mine Sasuke!” “I don’t think so. Take a little look at your body.” Reaper looked and noticed he was soaked to the marrow. “What the?” “Yes. Tsukiumi and I were using out powers to get you nice and wet. And I think you know my favorite element to use in battle.” Reaper tried to pull away, but you grabbed onto his wrists and knew he had no chance of escape. “That’s right. Chas Lightning!” you said as a blast of lightning came from your hands. Thanks to the water, it traveled through Reaper’s body and sadly, you got a little fried yourself. You were both blasted away from each other. “Sasuke!” She ran up to you and asked if you were alright. “Yeah, I just got a little fried.” As you tried to get up, you noticed that Reaper was still standing. “You really know how to piss me off Sasuke. You…will…DIE!!” he said as he charged at you. You tried to lift your arms, but because you got caught in the blast, your arms needed time to recover. As he charged at you, his anger had blinded him to the fact that Tsukiumi got in front of him until it was too late. “I will not let thee touch him!” she said as she thrusted the water blade into his chest. “Master Blackheart…forgive me.” he said as he died. His body then turned to ash and Tsukiumi went to check on you. “Are you alright Sasuke?” “Yeah, thanks to you. I say we go home now.” “Agreed.” She helped you up and you told her to hang on to you. “Alright.” She held onto you and you yelled “Chaos Control!” Both of you were instantly transported back to Maison Izumo.
1121111111111111.title: Reaper's Defeat

11211111111111111.content: As soon as you returned to Maison Izumo, Miya had Kagari take a look at your injuries. He patched you up and even though you felt a little better, you could barely use your arms. When it came around the time to eat dinner, Tsukiumi was the one to feed you. “So Blackheart’s general is dead huh?” “Yes. But as strong as he was, he’s nothing compared to Blackheart.” “How much stronger could he be?” “Let’s just say, even a thousand Reapers couldn’t beat Blackheart. They wouldn’t even come close.” Everyone was extremely surprised by the fact such a powerful being could exist. “Yes, but Blackheart is the least of the problem for the planet.” “What does thou mean?” “Let’s just deal with Blackheart first Tsukiumi.” Once you had finished your dinner, thanks to Tsukiumi, you went outside to look at the moon. Shortly after that, you went to bed with Tsukiumi.
11211111111111111.title: Later

112111111111111111.content: The next day, you woke up and thanks to your powers, you were able to use your arms again. Breakfast went by as it usually does. But when it was around lunch, you could sense a great darkness and you knew who was the source. You quickly went out to search for him. You searched fro about an hour before you fund the source. The source appeared to be a man in a back jacket, but you knew who it really was. “Blackheart!” The man looked up and saw you on the roof. He smiled and vanished in an instant and reappeared a few feet behind you.
112111111111111111.title: The Next Day

1121111111111111111.content:
(Blackheart)

You and Blackheart stared each other down for a moment before he spoke to you. “Long time no see, Sasuke. I hear you defeated Reaper, of course you had a little help.” “I will make you pay for all the damage that. you’ve done.” “I don’t think you have the power.” “What?” “Allow me to explain. I have killed quite a few people since our last encounter. And from each kill, I sucked up their souls and increased my power. Allow me to demonstrate.” He said as he thrusted his arm forward and you were sent flying onto the MBI building. “Incredible. He has so much power that this is ridiculous.” Blackheart then appeared in front of you and said “Thanks for noticing. Now I think I am going to let you train until the solar eclipse. But before I go…” he said as he focused energy into his hand. He grabbed your neck and sent a massive amount of dark lightning into your body. As you screamed in pain, Tsukiumi could sense you were in grave danger. Blackheart then moved your body into the direction of Maison Izumo and fired a large lightning blast and sent you flying again. As Tsukiumi was about to rush off to find you, you landed into the yard creating a small crater. “Sasuke!” “He’s back. Blackheart is back…” you said as you lost consciousness. Tsukiumi needed a little help getting you inside. Musubi came out and helped her out.
1121111111111111111.title: Blackheart Returns

11211111111111111111.content: You woke up about a week later. You took a quick look around and noticed that Kusano was the one watching you. “Hey, you’re awake Sasuke.” “Yeah, I guess I am Ku.” “Wait here, I’ll go get the others.” she said as she left the room. “As if I could move anyway.” you thought to yourself. In a few seconds, Tsukiumi came in and saw that what Ku said was true. “Sasuke! Thank goodness you’re awake.” “Sorry to worry you Tsukiumi.” The others came in shortly after Tsukiumi did. “Hey Sasuke.” “How you feeling?” “Well, I feel a bit better than the last time I was awake. How long was I out?” “About a week.” “A week?!” “Yeah, this Blackheart guy must be as strong as you said he was.” “Unfortunately, he is not in his true form yet.” “What do you mean?” “His true form is that of a true demon. We have until the solar eclipse to stop him.” “Thou cannot do this alone anymore.” “You’re right Tsukiumi. I am going to need everyone’s help here.” “Alright, what can we do?” “Well, I do know Musubi is a fist-type Sekirei, and Ku can keep her distance and still help out.” “You can count on me.” “Minato, I need you to get a hold of Seo.” “Why?” “We are going to need his help for this as well.” “Alright, I’ll call him up.” “Matsu, I need you to take control of one of MBI’s satellites and use one of the lasers on Blackheart. We only need one shot.” “Right.” “Tsukiumi and I will work together to deliver the final blow.” “Agreed.” “From the look of things, we only have 3 hours to take him down. We start this thing ASAP. Agreed?” “Yeah!” "Hopefully that guy Homura will help us out. Ifhe does, you need to avoid fighting him Tsukiumi." "As you wish." You and everyone got ready to battle Blackheart. Seo agreed to helping you, free of charge being what was at stake here.
11211111111111111111.title: The Battle Plan

112111111111111111111.content:
(Hikari Hibiki Both)

As you, Tsukiumi, Musubi, Ku, Hikari, Hibiki, Seo and Homura were searching for Blackheart, Matsu tried to get at least three of MBI’s satellites under her control. It didn’t take you long to find him, so you just had to get him away from the city, and fast. The eclipse was approaching fast. You shot a small shot of lightning at him to get his attention. It worked. You then pointed to a nearby park and he knew what you wanted. You and the others rushed off to the park and Blackheart arrived shortly after that. “So, you decided to get some help huh? Once I achieve my true form, you will need a lot more than these fools to defeat me.” “Well, I guess we should speed this up then. Now Matsu!” “Right!” she said as she used the three satellite lasers at the exact same time. When it hit Blackheart, it did do some damage, but he was far from killed. “I will admit, that actually hurt.” “Matsu, do not fire them again until I give the signal.” “Got it.” “Alright guys, Let’s take him down.” “Right!” they all said as you split up You and Tsukiumi went into a group and the others went on their own. Musubi went first and fought Blackheart hand-to-hand. “Well, you seem to be pretty strong.” “I could say the same thing to you.” Musubi then landed a kick and sent him out of the crater. As soon as that happened, Seo empowered Hikari and Hibiki and they began to say their incantation. “By the thunderstorm of our pact…” “Our Ashikabi’s perils will be destroyed!” “Here comes, God’s Song!” A massive lightning blast came from the sky and struck Blackheart. He was still standing. “How is he still standing?” “I don’t know, but our time is running out.” You and Homura worked together to burn his body to the point where it looks like molten lava. “Damn, he’s still standing.” “You think a little heat can stop me?” “No, but I bet this will. Now Tsukiumi!” “Right.” Tsukiumi grasped your hand and you both got ready to use your own Water Dragon attack. “Chaos…” “Water Dragons!” You both thrusted your free hand forward and two water dragons came from your hands. They combined into the Ultimate Water Dragon attack. It collided with Blackheart with tremendous force and created a deep crater filled with water. “We did it!” “No. We were not able to take him down in time. Look.” you said pointing to the sun. The eclipse had reached its peak. And you knew Blackheart was far from beaten.
112111111111111111111.title: The Battle Begins

1121111111111111111111.content:
(His true form http://bestgamewallpapers.com/files/marv...)

Once the eclipse was complete and then the sky went a dark red. The clouds turned into faces that looked like they were in eternal pain. Purple lightning began to light the sky and you all saw Blackheart reach his true form. As he was transforming, you gave everyone an energy barrier that would help them survive Blackheart's attacks.. He then let out a mighty roar that shook the ground as his transformation was complete. His voice was far more demonic now. “I am free at last!” yelled into the sky as lightning continued to light up the sky. You knew that the entire universe would fall if you failed to stop him. "I missed this body of mine. There is no one in the entire universe that can stop me now. Let me give you a sample of my power." he said as he raised his arm up with his hand dipped downward. He then straightened his hand and a massive energy burst sent you and the others flying towards a building. As you were flying, you used your powers to gently set everyone else on the ground. But you ended up getting slammed trhough a building. The glass form the buildings behind him shattered due to the amount of power that was just used. “Glorious. I had more power than I realized. Now you die Sasuke!” he said as he charged at you. But before he could do it, his body felt a huge amount of pain. Lightning surrounded his body and it looked like he was short-circuiting. “It seems my body is not used to this power yet. I must wait 24 hours beforeI end this." "We will finish this in the Grand Canyon." "Agreed. Until then, enjoy your last day on Earth.”
1121111111111111111111.title: Countdown to Destruction

11211111111111111111111.content:
(Mother)

As everyone else was still in shock from the amount of power Blackheart possessed, you knew it was going to come down to a one-on-one. You and the others went back to Maison Izumo for a little while. But soon, the time to battle Blackheart was fast approaching. “I must go now, alone.” “But Sasuke-” “Tsukiumi, please. As your Ashikabi, please respect my wishes.” “Alright. I will.” “Thank you. But before I leave, there is something I have to take care of first.” You said as you used Chaos Control to teleport to the shattered remnants of your old home, the residence of the Uchiha clan. “Wow, I wish I had time to be nostalgic.” you said as you walked into your house. You went into your old room, which you haven’t seen in ten years. You then walked over to an open floorboard and tore it open. Inside there was a small chest. “I remember the day my mother gave this to me.” (Flashback) “Sasuke, I want you to have this.” “What is it mom?” “This is the Heart of the Uchiha. I want you to keep this safe. And when you fall in love, give this to her when you feel the time is right.” “Alright mom.” (End Flashback) “I guess now is as good of time as any.” You said as you used Chaos Control to go back to Maison Izumo. When you arrived, you stood outside and used your power to create a note for Tsukiumi. You then used the power of wind to put the not and the Heart of the Uchiha on the kitchen table. You then used Chaos Control to go to the Grand Canyon. But when you got there, you noticed MBI satellites locked onto you, broadcasting everything to the Capital city. “I see Minaka wants Tsukiumi to see this.” And in that moment, Blackheart appeared and the sky went dark. “Are you ready to finish this Sasuke?” “Yes. It’s time to avenge my clan.”
11211111111111111111111.title: The Heart of the Uchiha

112111111111111111111111.content: As you and Blackheart stared each other down, Miya went into the kitchen for a moment and she saw the chest on the table. “Sasuke must have come back without us knowing.” She walked over to the chest ad saw the note meant for Tsukiumi. She went back to the others and gave Tsukiumi the chest and note. “What is this?” “Sasuke left this for you. He came back without us knowing.” Miya handed Tsukiumi the chest and read the note. “Tsukiumi, in case I do not survive, I wanted you to have this; the Heart of the Uchiha. My mother gave this to me and told me to give it to the one I love when the time is right. I love you Tsukiumi. Sasuke.” Tsukiumi looked at the chest. She opened it and found a heart made out of pure sapphire. It was the size of her palms. She began to tear up when she saw this. “Sasuke…” Meanwhile, back with you and Blackheart, you made the first move. You threw a powerful punch, but he caught it with ease. You continued to use close-ranged attacks, but he continued to block. “Now it’s my turn.” He then landed a powerful punch you your stomach in an instant. As you began to bend over in pain, he used his knee to slam your chin. He continued with a flurry of punches. He then sent you into the air and created a chain made out of negative energy. He wrapped it around your leg and threw you back down on the ground. He spun around and sent you into the canyon wall. “Sasuke!” Blackheart destroyed the chain and said “Come on. Don’t tell me that’s all you can offer me, Sasuke Uchiha!” As she was watching, Tsukiumi started to pour her feeling into the Heart of the Uchiha, which you were able to hear every word. “Sasuke…” “Tsukiumi?” “You must defeat him. If you fail, not only will the entire world be destroyed, but I will lose the person most precious to me; you. I beg of you Sasuke, you must win.” You knew this was the moment of truth. As Blackheart was getting ready to leave, he then saw your hands coming out of the hole in the canyon wall. “I see you are still able to stand.” You came out of the wall and said “I will not fail. I have so many people depending on me. But more importantly…” Tsukiumi appeared in your head. “I must protect the woman I love. And I will defend her to the bitter end!” Just then, a great power awakened inside of you and in that moment, a huge explosion came from where you were standing. When the dust cleared, Both Tsukiumi and Blackheart were surprised. You were surrounded by a golden aura and your hair was as golden as Tsukiumi’s. The energy you had ended up destroying your shirt. “What the hell?!” “Blackheart, your hour has arrived.”
112111111111111111111111.title: The Battle Begins

1121111111111111111111111.content: As he saw your new power, Blackheart began to lightly tremble, and rightfully so. “No, I don’t care how much power you have, I will destroy you!” he said as he fired a huge blast of negative energy. You just stood there and just before it hit, you raised your hand and caught the blast, purified it and fired it back at him twice as strong as it was originally. It sent him into the canyon walls and half a mile away from the Grand Canyon. “Sasuke…” she said amazed by your power. But then, Blackheart came charging toward you in anger and threw a powerful punch at you. You caught it, but the speed he was attacking at caused you to slide to the end of the canyon. “Impossible!” “My turn. Chaos Chidori Stream!” you said calling on the power of lighting. A massive amount of lightning into his body, causing him to roar in pain. You then threw him forward and sent him through a tower of rock, which collapsed on top of him. You then jumped high into the air and called on the power of fire. “Chaos Phoenix Flower!” you said as you fired a great number of large fireballs at him. The fire began to burn where Blackheart was. Everyone was amazed by your power. Blackheart once again emerged from the canyon with much more rage. But before he could do anything, you then appeared right in front of him and landed a powerful punch to his stomach. You then called on all of your energies and focused them into a ball. “No!” “You know what’s coming! Chaos Rasengan!” you said thrusting the sphere forward and sent Blackheart all the way back to the Capital City. Blackheart tried to stand but you grabbed him by the head and lifted him up. “Please, have mercy…” “Sorry. All out of mercy.” you said creating the Chidori, only the lightning was a rainbow of colors. You thrusted your hand forward into his heart and yelled “Chaos Chidori!” The energy surged through him and destroyed his body instantly. Once he was destroyed, the sun finally began to shine again over the planet.
1121111111111111111111111.title: The Final Battle

11211111111111111111111111.content:
(Your look, includes sword http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs23/f/2008/0...)

As you stood on top of a grassy hill, you changed back to your normal self, feeling extremely drained. But despite that, you couldn’t help but smile. You fell back onto the hill and looked at the clear sky. “I did it. My clan has been avenged, but only because Tsukiumi had faith in me.” you thought to yourself. And just then, Tsukiumi arrived and saw you lying on the ground. “Speak of the angel…” “Thou aret truly impressive. Though your power did tear up your suit.” You looked at yourself and noticed not only was your shirt completely gone, but your pants were pretty shredded. “I guess you have a point there.” you said with a chuckle. “I do have a spare outfit back at the old Uchiha compound. But for now, I say we just enjoy the peace and quiet together.” Tsukiumi smiled and said lying net to you “As you wish.” The two of you lied there for about an hour before you told Tsukiumi to head back to Maison Izumo. You then went to the Uchiha compound and got into your new outfit. You also grabbed your sword and placed it behind your back. When you returned to Maison Izumo, you saw that everyone had a party prepared to congratulate you on the defeat of Blackheart. “That outfit does suit thee Sasuke.” “Thank you Tsukiumi. Now let’s party.” Everyone agreed and the party began. After a while, you and Tsukiumi were on the roof and looked at the moon. “Tsukiumi, I would not have been able to defeat Blackheart if it weren’t for you. I am lucky to have someone like you as both my sekirei and my wife.” “And I am lucky to have thee as well.” The two of you embraced each other Then you leaned in and kissed each other passionately. But you knew that even though Blackheart was destroyed, the danger was far from over.

TO BE CONTINUED....
11211111111111111111111111.title: A New Look

1122.content: Two months have passed since you defeated Blackheart, and you had bought a house that was right next door to Maison Izumo. Tsukiumi went over there to train with Miya, and so did you, but you also went over there to check up on Minato and the others. But even though Blackheart was destroyed, you knew that the ultimate evil would soon reveal itself. But you knew that as long as you had Tsukiumi at your side, you could do anything.
1122.title: Chaos Continues

11221.content:
(You Tsukiumi)

One day, you were both at Maison Izumo with the others. Tsukiumi and Musubi were training with Miya, while you were playing with Kusano. Later on in the day, you were along on the roof thinking. “What is this feeling? This energy that seems to be getting stronger and stronger. Whatever it is, one thing’s for sure; it’s not friendly.” Just then, you felt the presence of someone else. You looked and saw Tsukiumi. “Hey Tsukiumi.” “Sasuke, Miya wanted me to retrieve you for dinner.” “Of course.” you said standing up. You and Tsukiumi both went inside and ate dinner with the others.
11221.title: That Day

112211.content:
(Miya Musubi Minato Kusano)

As soon as dinner was finished, you both thanked Miya for letting you eat with them. “Oh it’s no trouble. We love to have you come and visit.” “Keep in touch you two.” “Will do Musubi. I’ll come back and play soon Ku.” “Okay.” “Minato, give our regards to Matsu will you?” “Sure.” “Farewell.” “See ya.” you both said as you left. You and Tsukiumi returned home and you decided to head for the Zen Garden that you put into your house with your powers. It was as large as the house itself, but thanks to the power of Chaos Control, it’s in another dimension, a pocket dimension if you will. This was the same with the training hall and the bath, which was like a hot spring you created with your powers of earth and water to create. You used your power of fire in order to keep the water heated to the perfect temperature.
112211.title: Later

1122111.content: Later on that night, once you were finished meditating in the Zen Garden, you decided to head for the springs. And as usual, Tsukiumi joined you. Luckily, she was wearing the usual black bikini. Tsukiumi may be your wife, but you have yet to see her naked, even the thought of her naked made your nose bleed. But as the two of you were bathing together, you couldn’t help but wonder about that energy you were feeling. “Sasuke.” “Yes, Tsukiumi.” Tsukiumi then took your hand. “It’s been some time since I married thee. Tell me…” she said as she placed your hand on her breast. “Does thou ever wish to make love to thy wife?” Your face went a bright red and your heart rate increased dramatically. You then regained your composure and Tsukiumi had gotten her answer. She then leaned up against you with a smile on her face and her hands on your chest. “I never gave you an answer, what’s with this reaction?” “Thou loggerhead, you and I are connected remember?” “That’s right. I had forgotten.” you said as you embraced her. The two of you got out of the springs and went to bed shortly after that.
1122111.title: In The Bath

11221111.content: The next day, you woke up at dawn and started to rain. As with the bath and the Zen Garden, the training hall was in a pocket dimension. You were able to train to the fullest without waking everyone else. You spent about three hours training before you stopped. Once that was finished, you went to the Zen Garden for a bit. But the peace was ended by a massive amount of energy outside. You and Tsukiumi went to investigate this problem.
11221111.title: The Next Day

112211111.content: As soon as you and Tsukiumi got outside, you saw ten monsters coming from some kind of gateway. “People of the surface world, we are the Ten Terrors, and we have come to destroy this world in the name of the Master!” One of them turned and saw you with Tsukiumi. “Sasuke, it is good to see you again. I see you have a new friend with you. Allow us to introduce ourselves. I am Skulpin.” “I am Megahorn.” “I am Hekatoid.” “I am Itasis” “I am Matoombo.” “I am Blacklance.” “I am Serpentina.” “I am Magma.” “I am Gekkor.” “And I am Oculus.” “The Ten Terrors. I should have know you would show yourselves after Blackheart’s destruction." “We are here to take revenge on you for what your clan did to us.” he said as he drew his weapon and fired a blast of lightning at you. You thought it was no problem, until it hit you and sent you trough a building. “Sasuke!” she said as she ran up to you and picked the front part of your body off the ground. “I’m alright Tsukiumi.” “Do not worry. We will not attack you at the same time, we must follow the rules of darkness.” “But rest assured, you will be defeated and the Master will return.” he said as they left. You tried to stand but that lightning had caused so much pain that you passed out.
112211111.title: The Ten Terrors

113.content:
(You Tsukiumi Minato Matsu Seo)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the once mighty Uchiha Clan. You were also born with the power of Chaos which made you the strongest member of your clan to ever exist. You swore to avenge your clan no matter what the cost. However, after your clan was destroyed, you were left alone to defend yourself. Until you soon met a man named Takahito. He took you in with his wife Miya Asuma. During some of that time, you learned about MBI and the Sekirei plan. Miya and Takahito soon turn this place into a boarding house. And it became home to Matsu, Homura, who also went by the name Kagari, and Uzume. All three of whom were Sekirei. You also met a man named Seo who built a secret room for Matsu who was on the run from MBI. He also had two lightning Sekirei named Hikari and Hibiki. But then, Takahito died one day and you did everything you could to help Miya, who was like a mother to you. All the while you still continued your training. Thanks to Miya, you kept getting stronger and stronger. Ten years later, the Sekirei plan continue to progress, and soon a man name Minato Sahashi, who was the same age as you move in with his Sekirei named Musubi. That is when things began to get more entertaining. Musubi was always excited to spar, and with you and Miya, her skills progressed each day. Not too long after that, Minato gained his second Sekirei named Kusano, or Ku for short. She was just a little girl but she saw Minato as her big brother. And then Matsu became his third Sekirei the next day. You had never seen an ashikabi gain three Sekirei in such a short time. But you had no idea that soon you would become and ashikabi yourself.

It was a beautiful day and you decided to relax on the roof. You were enjoying the peace and quiet very much and decided to sleep. However, during your nap, you soon had an odd dream. You could only see a woman in a black dress with long blond hair stood before you. “Wait a minute, who are you?” “At last I have found you. I hope you’re prepared ashikabi, for death!” she said turning toward you. You woke up in that moment and had a feeling this was more than just a simple dream. So you decided to see the one person you know could help you out with this. You knocked on Matsu’s door. “Matsu, can I talk to you?” “Sure Sasuke.” she said before opening the door and you walked in. You also noticed Minato and Ku in the room too. “So what’s up?” You told Matsu about your dream. “Wow, so the girl in your dreams wants to kill you huh? What did she look like?” “Let’s see…she had long blond hair, a black dress, and a really angry look on her face.” She began to search through that database of hers. “From what you just told me, a Sekirei has now connected with you unconsciously. Its not surprising that a Sekirei would eventually react to you Sasuke, especially with the powers you possess.” You nodded and soon she got her answer. “Oh no. Sasuke is this her?” You looked at the screen and it was a perfect match. “Yeah, that’s her.” “This isn’t good. Actually, this is really, really bad. That’s Tsukiumi.” From the tone of her voice, this woman had quite the reputation among Sekirei. “Tsukiumi, Number 9. She’s very dangerous. A water Sekirei. Infamous for her intense hatred of ashikabi. If she’s reacting to your powers then, I imagine you’ve damaged her pride an made her angry.” “I see. Well I have to find her.” “Sasuke, what happens if she does find you? She could kill you.” “Maybe. But I cant just ignore this.” “He’s right. Well we might as well help him out.” You looked at Matsu surprised. She, Minato, Musubi and Ku decided to help you out. Musubi would travel the rooftops while Minato and Ku went with you. Though Matsu’s title “Operation: Kill or be Killed” wasn’t exactly encouraging, you all went with the plan. As you, Ku and Minato were walking around, you eventually were surprised by a cat who jumped off a small roof to get away. Ku caught the cat with the plant she was carrying before it hit the ground. “Nice catch kid.” You all looked up to see Seo. It turns out he was on a job for a client that lost her cat. And of course Seo did this for the money. However Hikari and Hibiki soon arrived an they seemed to be running form something. “Get thee hence!” You looked up. “I said out of the way!” You soon found yourself on the ground. “Ugh…” “Loathed monkey, I bid thee-” she stopped as soon as she looked at you and she fell to her knees panting. “What does this mean? Why am I brought to my knees? The heat…it grows stronger…” she thought to herself. “It’s you.” She looked at you with a glare and stood up. “Bastard. Thou, thou art he!” she said as water formed around her. “I know thou seek to defile me, but all I shall grant I suffering. Thou shalt only be relieved through death!” You knew this wasn’t good.
113.title: Chaos Begins

1131.content:
(Hikari Hibiki Both)

While Tsukiumi tried to kill you, you wanted to keep innocent people out of harms way an manage to lure her into a very, very large alley. But she managed to cause you to lose your footing when she hit the ground just behind you. “Wait. Just listen to me.” “Not on thy life. Water-” before she attacked, Kusano got in front of you and use her power of plants to cause a tree to change the field of the area. “Ku, calm down. You cant fight her.” She stopped. “Thank you, Ku.” you said smiling. “It’s a child. But why is she? You despicable fiend!” “Huh?” “Thou has sank thy claws into a child?” “Hold on, its not what you think.” Water began to form a torrent around her. “Filthy man. What thou needest is a shower. Water Celebration!” she fired a blast of water an you an sent you into the wall of the building behind you. “She’s strong. That actually hurt a little.” you thought to yourself as you began to rise to your feet. She watched you while standing on a very large branch of Ku’s tree. “Weakling. I only used a modicum of the power I possess. Before I give thee another taste of it, to what I thou want me to listen?” “I want you to be my…no wait, I need you to be my Sekirei.” “Wait, what was that?” Seo, Hikari and Hibiki stood by. “Ooh.” “Have I gone mad, or didst thou just request me to be thy Sekirei?” “That’s right, I did. I need your power.” “How couldst thou be so shameless in public?” “Shameless?” “As much as I despise thee, I thought to spare thy life. But now…” she said looking at you intensely. “Yeah?” “I will destroy thee!” she said as she prepared to attack. “Uh-oh. She’s serious.” You stood still ready to take whatever she threw at you. She fired of a blast of water so strong it wiped out a huge chunk of the building, but you were unscathed. Tsukiumi was on her knees panting. “I let my anger cloud my aim. I shall not be so careless with the next shot.” “Go ahead then. I’m not moving until you listen to me. I’m begging you.” She wobbled a little an place her hands on her heart. “Why? Why doth my chest feel like this?” She thought to herself as she prepared another attack. “Hey Blondie! My sister and I aren’t done with you yet.” “You two. Didn’t thou learn thy lesson last time?” “Oh please. The only one around here who is about to learn something is you. Seo.” “Yeah, yeah.” She looked at Seo and thought. “That man, another ashikabi?” “Jeez, guess I got no choice. Hey, you might want to close your eyes kid. This might be too hot to handle for ya.” “Would you just shut up and do it?” “What art thou going to do?” Seo looked at Hikari an moved to kiss her. Minato covered Kusano’s eyes. “Ku whatever you do, don’t look.” Seo kissed Hikari and empowered her and did the exact same to Hibiki. Tsukiumi was just speechless and blushing when she saw this. “What on earth did that human just do?” “Oh that? It’s simple.” “He empowered his Sekirei’s.” The two of them clasped each others hand and raised them. “By the thunderstorm of our pact…” “Our ashikabi’s perils will be destroyed!” “That’s an incantation only emerged Sekirei’s use.” The sky went dark when their incantation finished and a large sphere of lightning formed in the sky. You knew if that hit her, she’d be done for. With their unclasped hands, they aimed the blast right at Tsukiumi. “Here comes, God’s Song!” The lightning struck the ground an moved toward Tsukiumi. “Watch out!” you said charging in. After a few moments, Tsukiumi opened her eyes to see you were holding onto her. Needless to say she was surprised. “Crap! That guy’s blocking our shot!” She backed up looking at you. “Why wouldst thou…?” She turned her head and saw that the lightning devastated most of the alley. “You’d be toast if he hadn’t knocked you out of the way.” Her eyes widened and she looked at you. “Hey, are you okay?” “This man. He protected me with his own body.” The twins were ready to attack again. “Ready for more?” She stood up an charged at them. “Bring-eth it!” She attacked them but her attack hit Seo and the cat got away. Seo was pissed off. As soon as Tsukiumi landed he came at her. “Hey, you!” Tsukiumi turned and saw Seo sliding down a rail that ran up the building. He jumped an lane right in front of her. “Seo, please calm down.” He walked towards her. “Stay back, fiend!” she said trying to smack him away but he grabbed her wrist and put her against the tree. “So how are you going to pay me back Blondie?” “Take thy hands off of me.” “Not after you made me lose that cat and smacked my girls around.” She tried to call on her powers but couldn’t. “My strength, why can I not summon it?” she thought. “If you’re wondering how I’m doing this it’s thanks to my pal Takahito. He gave me a special ability. Oh yeah, one that cancels a Sekirei’s powers. And as for payback, how about I make you emerge and become my Sekirei?” Seo got closer an Tsukiumi tried to push him back. “No. This is not him. I do not want this. The one…the one that I want is..” “Hey, Seo.” “What?” “Please let her go. If not I will fight you for her. It’s because…she’s my Sekirei!” Tsukiumi looked at you in surprise. Seo smiled and let her go and looked at you. “SEO!” The twins struck him with lightning and he was fried a little. “Don’t you remember what you said? That we’re the only ones for you?” “Whoa, hold on.” “Maybe this will jolt your memory a little. You ready sis?” “Now just wait, calm down. I was just trying to scare her.” He was hit with a large amount of electricity and was unable to move, yet he was alive for sure. Tsukiumi jumped down and looked at you. “Monkey. I heard. Thou called me 'My Sekirei' did thou not?" You nodded. "Then thou must take the responsibility." “Of what?” She doused you with water when you asked that. "Do not jest! Thou said I was thy Sekirei correct?" "Yes, I did." "Thou hast courage. Not only didst thou protect me with thy own flesh, but also from that vile Ashikabi over there." You looked at Seo who was still pretty fried. "Not really." She stepped closer to you. “For a monkey, thou are a man of metal. It’s strange. But my heart which once clamored so loudly with protest, is surprisingly at peace now. What is thy name?” “My name, is Sasuke Uchiha." "Thank you." "Look, I know we don't know each other. But please be my Sekirei! I saw you in my dreams for a reason we were meant to be together. I.. I need you." Tsukiumi gasped lightly. "Thou has said enough now. Very well then. The Sekirei Tsukiumi, will graciously accept thy proposal of marriage." “Marriage proposal?!” She grabbed you by the collar of your shirt and asked angrily “You did call me thy Sekirei right?” "Yes, I guess I did I'm sorry." “Sasuke.” “Yes?” “Only one person gets to kill thee, from this day forward. And that person is me.” she said as she kissed you full on the lips. "What? What is this? This feeling rising from my heart, it's so warm and strong. So this is emergence." She thought to herself as she emerged. She leaned on you for a second then turned around walking away for a second then stopping. “Excuse me, miss.” “Thou may dispense with the formalities and address me as Tsukiumi. Thou art my ashikabi after all.” She said before she turned toward you. “As well, as my husband.” You smiled at this and went home with Minato, Ku, an now your own Sekirei, Tsukiumi.
1131.title: Tsukiumi, the Water Sekirei

11311.content:
(Kagari Miya Musubi)

As you were walking home, Miya and Kagari were talking in the back yard. “I wonder why no one’s home yet. I hope that nothing bad has happened.” Kagari chuckled. “You sounded like their mother just then, you know?” She turned to him with that same intimidating look of hers. “Hmm? What was that?” And as usual, some kind of demon face appeared next to her every time she did that. “I, um, meant their big sister.” “I guess you’re right. I give them advice and look after them. So I guess in a sense I am their big sister. Though Sasuke is a little different, I have been like a second mother to him. So you were right in that way Kagari.” He smiled at her. “We’re home.” Musubi said as you all walked in. “Oh, there’s the four of them now.” The sliding door opened and Miya saw Tsukiumi holding onto your arm. “Make that five.” “We’re real late. Sorry.” “And we hope you don’t mind, we brought our new friend home too.” “Perhaps you’d care to introduce us?” “Um, This is Miya. She’s our landlady.” “A pleasure. And who might you be?” “Well you see, she’s uh-” “I’m his wife.” “What do you mean my wife?!” “Your wife?” you both say in surprise. “But of course. We art both connected now, and that makes me thy wife.” “It does?” This got Ku an Musubi excited to see Minato as their husband too. You chuckled a little and of course, Miya knew she was your Sekirei. She told Minato that she knew about the Sekirei Plan so he didn’t nee to hide the facts from her. “And you, since you’re Sasuke’s Sekirei, welcome to Maison Izumo.” “I am Tsukiumi, Sekirei and Sasuke’s wife.” You knew this would take some getting used to. Still, you were very happy with Miya and the others. Though you were concerned for their safety. You had no idea when the ones who destroyed your clan would return. But even so, you would do whatever you could to stop them.
11311.title: Later that Day

13.content:
You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the strongest demon slayer clans to ever exist. You are also the strongest member of the clan that ever lived, as you were the Shadow Ranger. You were going to avenge your clan against Broodwing, the one who destroyed your clan, who worked for Emperor Grum. You were living a solitary life, until one day, things in your life changed forever.

You were chained to the inside of an army vehicle with so many chains that you were unable to move let alone use your sword. You were captured by the army and were originally headed to the army's secret underground lab but the section you were caught by was sent to Kamikura island. The section was quickly destroyed leaving only you. Once you were free, you changed into the Shadow Ranger and flew towards the five people who destroyed the section. One of them attacked you with her sword but you managed to beat her rather easily. The next one cracked the earth around you but you flew into the air and attacked the ground in front of him with your Shadow Saber. The third one tried to blow you away but you used your Shadow Slash and nullified her attack. There were only two left and you knew one of them couldn't fight so you took on the other one. She was a decent fight. Actually, her fighting was more than decent. She was the only one who was able to fight you on a level like this other than your old enemy Broodwing. But soon, she sent a shockwave at you, which you managed to send most of it into the ground to the side. But you still had a deep wound in your side, from which you were losing a large amount of blood. You passed out rather quickly and the five women gathered around you. One of them (Karasuba) was about to finish you off, but a man named Takahito Asuma stopped her and told the girls that you needed to stay alive.
13.title: Miya

132.content:
(You Karasuba Matsu Mutsu Takahito Itachi)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the strongest demon slayer clans to ever exist. You are also the strongest member of the clan that ever lived, due to your power of Chaos. You swore to get revenge against a demon named Blackheart, who served someone, but you had no idea who. One night, you slept on the branch of a tree as usual, when you were met in your dreams by your dead brother Itachi. “Sasuke.” “Itachi, it’s good to see you again.” “It’s good to see you too, but I am here to tell you that tomorrow, you will be captured by some kind of army. You must let this happen.” “Why?” “Because it will lead you to Kamikura Island, the place you will meet your destined one.” “Okay brother, I trust you.” Itachi nodded and when you woke up, you began to walk around in search of Blackheart again. You were soon surrounded by tanks and you knew this was Itachi spoke of, so you surrendered. You soon were brought through Kamikura Island and before you could use your powers to free yourself, the tank began to shake. You knew that it was now or never. You used your superior strength to break free of the chains and bust out of the tank before it was destroyed. Once you were free, you dusted yourself off to see five life forms before you. You could tell they weren’t human thanks to your Sharingan. “It seems you missed one Karasuba.” “I guess I did.” she said before charging at you. You drew your sword and blocked her attack. Though she was surprised with the others, she continued as you continued to block the attacks. You then called on the power of earth to turn your hand to the hardest combination of minerals and grabbed the sword. The woman was very surprised now. “Don’t make me laugh.” you said as you landed a kick to her stomach. As soon as she was done, the male of the group attacked you as well, and you managed to beat him by sending a little lightning into his body. Another then called on the power of wind, but you blocked her attack with your own wind attack as well as send her back with it. You were left with only two of them, and you could tell only one could fight. “I’ll leave him to you.” You stared into the woman’s eyes and you could tell she was much stronger than the others. “Seems I’ll need to use all the skills I have against you.” The woman moved her sword and when she began to swing it, you had a bad feeling and got out of the path of the blade. But then, from her blade came a massive shockwave, which you barely avoided completely. “She has more power than I thought! I need to be careful.” you thought. The woman then charged at you and you blocked her attack. Like the one they called Karasuba, she never stopped attacking, only she was much more skilled than she was. You soon had this funny feeling inside you, and you could tell she had this feeling as well, though she didn’t show it much. Only you could see this. You had no idea why you had this feeling, but thinking about it gave her the opportunity to attack you and slice your side. You jumped back and gripped your side with one hand, still holding your sword in a position where you could attack or defend. But the woman stopped and you noticed that the same one from before came at you. She tried to fight you again and you blocked almost all of her attacks, but the wound in your side was causing you to lose a large amount of blood, and you were soon too weak to defend. “Looks like this is the end. Too bad, I was having a lot of fun.” She raised her blade and you knew you were in trouble. But then someone yelled “Stop!” You looked and saw a guy who seemed human to you. “What is it Takahito?” “He needs to stay alive Karasuba. We need to learn more about him and his powers. Kazehana, Matsu bring him inside.” The two women nodded and got under your shoulders, as you backed out, you noticed Karasuba getting ready, but the woman who caused the wound stopped her, and this time, Karasuba backed down. This was the last sight you had before losing consciousness. But as they were all walking in, Takahito spoke to the woman who you fought. “You had a reaction didn’t you?” The woman nodded. “I see. Well this day is very interesting indeed. I will put him in your hands for the time being.”
132.title: Chaos Begins

As to who you are your name is (name) why wouldn't you know it.


You walked down the streets of the city you now called home. leaving america was the best choice you felt was possible for you to make. there were too many graves belonging to mortals whom you had grown to care for and see them die by bullet, knife, or the ravages of time.


Being alive so long has allowed you to amass a moderate fortune which you have been living on for quite some time. But money dosen't mean much to someone who has eternity. You finaly arrive at Mansion Izumo and see your landlady Miya near the door

Miya: (Name) it's good to see that you are back lunch is ready.

(You Benitsubasa)

One day, Benitsubasa and Hiahane were just finishing a mission when Benitsubasa began to feel her Ashikabi was near-by. She told Hiahne and she let her find him. She began to use the rooftops to find their Ashikabi. She ended up near a mansion with a very large courtyard. They hopped on the roof and saw you. You were training in order to hone your powers. You control the power of chaos and you were training to focus your powers into your fists. A large number of machines you had created charged at you and you fought them off with ease. You didn't get the slightest scratch. As you continued to train, you could sense Benitsubasa. So you stopped training and the machines vanished. You looked up and said "Something I can help you with?" She jumped down while blushing and introduced herself. "I'm Benitsubasa. You're my Ashikabi." "Ashikabi? Do you mind explaining this to me? Come inside, you seemed to have traveled a ways." you said as you walked towards the door. You showed Benitsubasa to the living room and she was amazed with some of the stuff in there. "So, tell me what an Ashikabi is please." Benitsubasa then explained everyhting about the Sekirei Plan, The Disapline Squad and eerything else she knew. It was a lot for you to take in, but in the end, you decided that having a girl like Benitsubasa in your life would be a good thing. Plus, you might be able to get a little action as well. "Alright. I will be your Ashikabi. Now how do you emerge?" Benitsubasa walked over to you, sat down next to you and kissed you full on the lips. You did blush a little bit, you you kissed back and what you did not know is that ten red energy wings appeared behind her. But they disappeared in a short time and she was now your sekirei
1531.title: Benitsubasa

15311.content:
(Hiahane Karasuba Minaka)

As you and Benitsubasa got comfortable, comfortable, you heard a knock on the door. Without getting up, you used your powers to open the door. Just then, a woman with claws and white hair entered with a girl with long, silver hair and a sword with her. "Karasuba, Hiahane, what are you doing here?" "We heard that you have become emerged, so we decided to check it out." "So, this is your Ashikabi?" "Yes, this is..." "Where are my manners? I never introduced myself. My name is Shadow. A pleasure to meet you. So, I can tell you are also part of the Disapline Squad." "Yes, but there is one little condition to having a member as your Sekirei." "And that is?" "We need to test your skills." "Alight, come out to the courtyard. An do not hold back on my account." As you led Hiahane and Karasuba to the courtyard, Benitsubasa came to watch as well. You took a fighting stance and the two Sekirei charged at you. Hiahane was the first to challenge you. You dodged her claws with the greatest of ease. You then focused a little energy into the tips of your first two fingers and gently tapped her forehead. She then passed out as soon as that happened. Karasuba was up now. She charged at you with her sword and you jumped onto one of the statues. You created a perfect copy of Hiahane's claws from your own energy. Karasuba was impressed by this and so was Benitsubasa. You then charged at her and she blocked it with her sword. The battle raged on for a little while when you decide not to hold back. You then focused the power of wind into your claws and you made an upward slice which made the wind knock her sword out of her hands. You then jumped into the air and caugth the sword. You the had the blade at Karasuba's neck and she knew you had her beat. You gave her her swor back and the claws on your hands disappeared. Hiahane woke up shortle after that and Benitsubasa ran up to you. "Well, I am impressed. I think you will make a fine addition to the Disapline Squad." "I will join for only two reasons. I would work side-by-side with Benitsubasa and I would be able to have some fun as well." "I think that Minaka would be pleased to hear that." "I think he has heard it. I do keep a few small TV's here to stay updated with the news. And it seems he was watching the entire time.""Haha. Well, it seems you are a very skilled boy. Welcome to the Disapline Squad and MBI." "So you heard my one major condition?" "Yes. You and Benitsubasa will be working together form now on. You two will relax for the rest of the evening and tomorrow you will report to MBI HQ for training." "I understand." "See you then." he said as he left the TV screens. Karasuba and Haihane left shortly after that.

You knew she would try to escape using the copies to distract you both. You used your powers to create a massive spiked earth wall to keep her from escaping. "Right. Anything for you." "Let's have some fun." You then used the power of lightning to creat two lightning blades in your hands. "Twin Chaos Chidori!" you said charging into the crowd of clones. You used the Chidori on her Ashikabi's heart which instantly killed him. You destroyed the earth walls and Benitsubasa walked over to you and leaned against your chest. "Well, I have no knowledge of my last name. I'm not even human." "What do you mean?" "I am the result of an experiment called Project Shadow: The Ultimate Lifeform. Many humans fused the DNA of a human being with the power of the seven Chaos Emeralds. That is why I have so much power. But there was one being who felt threatened by my existence, Kagato. He found the Space Colony ARK and destroyed it. Only he knows the last name of the human whos DNA they used for my creation. Until I defeat him, he will not provide me the answers I seek." "Well, you can always count on me Shadow." "Please, do not fight against him. He is extremely powerful." "And so are we if we work together." "You're right of course. You and I will work together to defeat Kagato." You embraced Beitsubasa as she leaned up against you. The two of you went back to bed shrotly after that.

You pull over at an old bar and dismount your motorcycle and activated the security system. The moment you went inside a puck came up and tried to steal your motorcycle only to be electrocuted and knock out when he touched it.

--inside the bar--

You walk into the bar and go up to the bartender. "I need to see Typh." You tell him. The bartender looks at you for a second then nods and let's you behind the counter and takes you into the backroom where you walk down a flight of stairs hidden by a trapdoor. At the base of the stairs you open a metal door and see your friend, informant, and inventor looking at his computer. "Typh I need" You were cut off by Typh "Information on this copy cat and your suit right?" Typh answers turning to face you. "What do you have?" You ask nit surprised. "Well for your suit I'm making some upgrades on the armor so only you mask and cloak are ready. Also the fake's is name Acba. nationality India. he's a semi pro assassin and grade A nut job. He disappeared not long ago and reemerged as this new fake reaper thinking he would get more money, jobs, etc because of it." Typh tells you.

"Alright thanks." You say going across to the right side of the room and going through the door. On the other side was a lab white room rows of weapons from melee to guns and explosives there was even anti tank, anti aircraft, and anti vehicle weapons lining the walls. On the end of the room you can see multiple suits on manikins suits for urban combat, for night ops, amphibious ops, etc. But in the middle you saw it your old suit the Reaper's outfit that strikes fear into almost anyone who has saw it the suit that makes your enemies quake in fear the few that still live that is. You undress and put your civilian clothes on a bare manikin You grab a light weight shinobi armor from a manikin and put it on. You then walk to your suit you stand and stare at it for a few seconds before finally speaking. "I had hoped never too have to wear you again but it looks like that Reaper still has A part yet to play." You say before grabing the cloak and puting it on you then grab the red skull mask with black eye socket and put it onto your face. You feel it start moving on your hand completetly covering it and the optical systems activating.

"Nanobots simply incredible." You say commenting on the masks properties before turnings around to the weapons. You grab only a silver desert eagle .50 caliber, a hand full of smoke and flashbangs, shuriken, LHR Combat Knife which you place in the knife holster on you chest armor, and eight spar cartigaes of .50 Action Express. You turn around and go out the door to Typh's room. " Hold these for me will ya Typh." You say tossing the keys to your motorcycle to him which he caught without even looking. "His last know coordaniates were at he warehouses at the pier and Watch your back out there ok?" Typh says. "We'll do my friend will do." You say walking through the door on the left side of the room. On the other side was an huge garage with multiple vehicles. You get in one nearby and grabbed the key ad crank that car. "I guess the Reaper is going out to collect a soul tonight." You say this as you start driving

Before anyone could say anything else the lights went out. After a few seconds they came back on. Looking behind the fakes shoulder the Sekireis saw a cloaked figure with a red skull mask on. '(Name) your wearing your old outfit.' Karasuba thought as seeing that old outfit brought back allot of memories. "Reaper?" Karasuba states as both Hiahane and Benitsubasa went wide eyed. Thinking they were taking ti him the fake was about to comment when he heard someone talk behind him. "We meet again." You say your voice altered by the mask (think Darth Vader's voice) . The fake slowing turns around terror evident in his eyes. "So you are the one who has been using my name." You stay walking towards him. "Stay back I have this entire building rigged with explosives come one step closer and we all go die." the fake says frantically with a shaky hand holding the detonator. You stop and reach into your cloak. "Oh really would these be the explosives?" You sarcasticly asks droping defused explosives in front of you.
