153311.title: Which Colors

1533112.title: Silver and Green (Haihane, Benitsubasa and Kara...

15331122.content:
(You)

You are the Psycho Green Ranger, a being created by the monster known as Dark Specter. In a way, you could call him your father. But he seemed to have created a being that far to powerful to control. One day, you caught him off guard and betrayed him by absorbing all of his power. With the power you already possessed, combined with Dark Specters, your power was limitless. Before you struck him down with your Psycho Dragon Sword, he told you that you had six siblings as well. He told you that you would need to defeat them in order to get them to follow you. “You fool, no one can defeat me. It’s been nice knowing you, Father.” You then slashed him in half with a single swipe of your blade. Once he was destroyed, you decided to head for the planet Earth. Of course, you had forgotten about your father’s loyal servant Ecliptor. He knew he would need to wait until he was strong enough to fight you, let alone the other Psycho Rangers. But you had no idea that on Earth, you would gain three loyal partners in you only mission; destroy the human race and all those who stood in your way.
15331122.title: Psycho Green

153311221.content:
(Your Human form http://anime-finder.tripod.com/chase_you... ) (Haihane Benistubasa Karasuba)

Down on Earth, in the capital city of Shinto Tato, the Discipline Squad had just finished up a mission with a run-away. Though it was not a challenge to them. Benitsubasa was the one to take care of it. She grew bored of opponents like this, of course, she wanted to find her Ashikabi as well. She had no idea that her Ashikabi would drop down from space itself. As she was heading back, Benitsubasa saw a green light head straight for a place called the arboretum (Note this is after the bridge escape and Kagari becomes Minato’s 6th Sekirei) She decided to investigate. Karasuba called in that moment and told her that she and Haihane were heading there as well, along with about three dozen MBI troops.

-with you-

In the arboretum, you had just crash landed onto the Earth and knew you couldn’t just walk around looking the way you are. You decided to change your appearance into that of a human being. “How sad. To think I have to take on the form of a human. Oh well, this is only temporary.” You walked out of the crater an noticed that there were many human soldiers around you. “Hold it. You’re coming with us.” one of them said. You smiled and said “As if I could be stopped by such a pathetic species.” In that moment, you drew your sword and sliced a soldier in half. The others fired at you in that moment, but you were able to avoid the bullets like they were nothing. You slaughtered the soldiers and when only one of them was left, he tried to run. You pulled out your Dragon Dagger and threw it at him like a kunai. The blade pierced through his skull and killed him instantly. What you didn’t know is that Karasuba and Haihane were watching from a distance. “Well, this is one person I wouldn’t mind as my Ashikabi.” “I bet it’s because of the fact he has the same type of view of humans as you do Karasuba.” “Well there is that. And also his sheer brutality. And my body does seem to have a small reaction from him.” “Funny, mine does as well.” The two of them then notice you raise your hand and the dagger came out of the trooper’s skull and into your hand. You put your sword away as well as your dagger. It was in that moment that Benitsubasa arrived and saw the devastating carnage. You turned toward her and knew she was no human. “Well, things seem to have gotten interesting.”
153311221.title: The Arrival

1533112211.content: As the two of you stood before one another, your eyes locked and in that moment, Benitsubasa’s body began to react to you. “What is this? This feeling…does this mean he’s my Ashikabi?” she thought to herself. “So…” you said, snapping her out of it. “What are you? I can tell that you are not a human.” “M-My name is Benitsubasa. And I’m a sekirei.” she said with a blush. “Sekirei? That explains why you have a different life force around you than a human. Now what do you want, Benitsubasa?” “I-I believe you are my Ashikabi.” “Ashikabi? You need to explain yourself. And do not play games with me. You can tell from the evidence around you that I am not one to be toyed with.” Benitsubasa almost grew so weak from your strong and commanding tone that she couldn’t stand. She then explained to you everything about the Sekirei Plan she knew. Her role, the object of the game, even how to make a sekirei your own. Needless to say, this game peaked your interest. “Sounds like my kind of game. And you say I am your Ashikabi?” you said walking up to her. “Yes.” “Before you confirm that, you should know my true form. You see, this human body is nothing more than a ruse. Behold!” you said as you changed into your true Psycho Ranger form. To say the absolute least, Benitsubasa Haihane and Karasuba were extremely surprised. But now Benitsubasa’s body had reacted much stronger to your now. She fell onto one knee as she collapsed. You changed your head into that of a human and bent down to look her in the eye. “So, you still think I’m your Ashikabi?” “There’s no question. My body feels so hot. Only my Ashikabi could cause it to react this way.” “I see. Now, do you swear loyalty to me?” “Yes. As my Ashikabi, I devote myself to your command.” “Very good. As of this moment, you are my Sekirei, and I am your Ashikabi.” you said as you kissed her. Haihane & Karasuba watched this. She is not denying the fact you could be her Ashikabi, but she was still not sure. In that moment, you and Benitsubasa jumped onto the rooftop where Karasuba was and they introduced her to you. You could tell that the silver haired one thought the same way you do. “Hello.” “So, you got a name?” “Oh that’s right! I never got a name from my Ashikabi.” “I have no human name, but I might as well give myself one.” You thought about it for a moment. “Call me, Kurai.” “A name that fit’s the way you slaughtered those pathetic humans.” “Yes. Now, take me to this, MBI tower. I wish to rest from my journey through space.” They all nodded and led you to the tower, with Benitsubasa at your side the whole way there. Once you got there, you were brought to your own room. You decided to sleep up against the wall that night.
1533112211.title: An Interesting Game

15331122111.content: The next day, you woke up to the light of the sun against your face and went to find a training hall of some kind. It didn’t take you long to find one, and you noticed Karasuba there as well, training with her sword. “I see that you are an early riser as well Karasuba.” She stopped training and looked towards you. “I was about to say the same thing about you.” “Care for a little sparing match?” you said drawing your blade. “You sure you can handle me?” “Only one way to find out.” The two of you looked each other dead in the eyes for a moment before you both sprang into action. You decided not to use your powers being you might kill her in a single shot. The two of you were pretty evenly matched, even though neither of you were going all out. Before long, Karasuba sliced your cheek and you both jumped back. Karasuba just smiled and you felt the blood on your hand. “So, this is what it’s like to bleed.” “I see you’re enjoying yourself.” “And the fun is just getting started.” you said before charging at her with blinding speed before slicing her cheek as well. She jumped back and looked at you in a surprised manner. No one had ever caused her to shed blood. You then brought the blade of your sword to your mouth and licked the blood off. “Exquisite. You are one of a kind Karasuba.” “As are you, my dear Kurai.” You both put your blades away and decided to call this a draw.
15331122111.title: A Morning Duel

153311221111.content:
(Psycho Yellow/Yuri) (I forgot to mention these are your weapons. Sword: http://www.rovang.org/wiki/sword-of-dark... Dagger: http://images49.fotki.com/v1511/photos/4... )

Shortly after your duel with Karasuba, a small explosion came from the city. Benitsubasa came in and asked what could have caused this. “It seems one of my siblings has decided to show up. Benitsubasa, come. I want you to meet a member of the family.” “Coming Kurai.” she said with a blush. The two of you used the rooftops to go to the location of the disturbance. There you saw a yellow Psycho Ranger. “There you are, my brother.” “Psycho Yellow, my sister. Its nice to meet you at last.” “You know why I am here.” “You are here to duel me in order to see if I am a suitable leader.” “Yes, now show your true form so we can begin.” “As you wish.” you said as you transformed. “Benitsubasa, stay out of this. This is my battle.” “Yes, Kurai.” “So you gave yourself a human name?” “Its only temporary. Now show me what you got.” She happily obliged and pulled out her weapon. She fired two energy shots at you and by using your sword, you deflected the blasts with no trouble. You both charged at each other and you both used your martial arts skills to fight. You had to admit, she was strong, she even scored a couple of blows to you, but you still overpowered her easily. “I- I lost.” she said on her knees. “Yes, now do you swear your loyalty to me?” You said as you placed your sword on her shoulder.“Yes, Kurai.” Benitsubasa walked up to you and asked why she didn’t call you brother that time. “We are only siblings in terms of powers. She and I have no actual relation. And that does give me an idea. Psycho Yellow, do we have another sister?” “Yes, Psycho Pink.” “I see. For my plan to work, I will need her as well.” “What are you planning?” “You will see soon enough. But for now, you need a human form Psycho Yellow.” She nodded and changed into a human form. “In this form, you will be called Yuri.” “Yes, Kurai.” “Now it’s time to head back to MBI tower.” you said as you changed back an you once again used the rooftops to travel. Yuri and Benitsubasa followed you. What you didn’t know is that back at MBI, Haihane was now reacting to your power.
153311221111.title: Psycho Yellow

1533112211111.content: Soon, you had arrived at MBI Tower to find Haihane first to greet you. “Haihane, get your hands off my Ashikabi!” “Actually, he is my Ashikabi as well, Washboard.” “What did you call me?!” “Enough, both of you!” Both of them calmed down in an instant. “Listen, if you are to be my second sekirei, you must swear to me your loyalty.” Haihane bowed and swore her loyalty to you. You then placed your thumb and your first finger at her chin and kissed her, making her emerge. She was also your second sekirei. Karasuba knew that she would be your next sekirei. But she would need to see more from you before she accepted you as her Ashikabi, even though you had such incredible powers.
1533112211111.title: Haihane Emerged

15331122111111.content:
(Psycho Pink/Sakura)

That night as the light of the full moon filled the night sky, you noticed a figure standing on top of a radio tower. Using your superior sense of sight, you could make out the figure to be a Psycho Ranger. “Well, another of my psycho siblings has come to play.” you said as you walked out onto the balcony. You changed into your psycho form and used your full speed to race to the other Psycho Ranger (Note, the Psycho Rangers leave a light behind them that is the same color they are when they use their full speed). Soon, you reached the radio tower and came face-to-face with the Psycho Pink Ranger. “Psycho Pink. A pleasure.” “The pleasure is mine. I hope you know that I will be harder to defeat than Psycho Yellow was.” “Good to hear, now come at me!” you said as you drew your sword. “With pleasure!” she said as she pulled out a bow. “Let me introduce you to my Psycho Arrows.” she said as you both walked in a circle while looking each other in the eyes. She then created an arrow made of energy and shot it at you. You managed to deflect it, but her speed with creating and firing arrows was incredible. She eventually managed to make a slice in your left arm. “I’m very impressed Sister. You managed to wound me, which is no easy task.” “I’m glad you’re impressed.” “However…” you said as you threw your sword into your left hand and placed your right hand just in front of your helmet “Don’t get overconfident!” you said as you thrusted your arm forward and fired a green energy beam at her. It managed to score a direct hit, giving you the chance to get in much closer. You then attacked with your sword by slicing and ‘X’ into her torso before making a powerful horizontal slash, which sent her flying backwards. Though she was not done, she brought her right hand in front of her helmet as well and fired a pink beam at you. But you blocked dodged it and attacked with a powerful kick (Which left a green energy trail behind it) and caused her to fall to the ground. As she struggled to get up, she knew she had lost. “I admit defeat. And I swear my eternal loyalty to you.” You extended your hand and helped her up as you changed into your human form. “Welcome, my sister. Now you must take on a human form for a short time.” “As you wish.” she said as she transformed into a human as well. “Sakura. That shall be your name until I set the next stage of my plan into motion.” “Very well. But please tell me that is soon my brother.” “Call me Kurai in this form. And yes, I will give you and the others the details tomorrow. Now come.” you said as you and Sakura returned to MBI tower. That night, you returned with Psycho Pink for a well deserved rest.
15331122111111.title: Psycho Pink

153311221111111.content:
(Psycho Pink is now called Yumi and Psycho Yellow is now called Yomi)

The next morning, Haihane and Benitsubasa got dressed and saw you with Sakura and Yuri. “Good morning Kurai.” “I hope you slept well.” “I slept fine, thank you. And you both have great timing. I have a question for the two of you.” “And that is?” “Where does MBI keep the defeated sekirei’s?” “They keep them in the basement. Why?” “It’s time that my sisters become sekirei’s themselves.” “Huh? Is that even possible?” “Yes, we can merge with a sekirei if Kurai gives us what is known as an incantation.” “Then we take on their form and their powers, while keeping our own as well.” “Incredible.” “Let’s go.” you said standing up. But before the three of you could leave the room, Karasuba showed up. “Karasuba, you needed something?” “No. But you will need my help in order to get inside the vault.” “I appreciate the help, though I am curious as to why you wish to assist me at all.” “My reason is simple, you have been peaking my interests this whole time. I’m just making sure you continue to do so.” You chuckled and said “Fair enough. Leas the way.” You, Yuri and Sakura followed Karasuba down to the vault where the defeated sekirei’s were kept. You noticed that the pickings were not that diverse, though you soon found two suitable hosts for the two of them. “Psycho Yellow, here is one that will suit you very well.” Psycho Yellow walked up to the sekirei. “What is this one called?” “That is number 43, Yomi. That scythe there is her weapon of choice.” "You should be able to use that weapon with ease." “I agree with you Kurai.” You pushed the button and opened the capsule so that Psycho Yellow was able to enter the body. Once she did that, the sekirei symbol reappeared, though she was not an emerged sekirei anymore. “Are you in complete control, Psycho Yellow?” “Yes, Kurai.” “Excellent. Now for you Psycho Pink. This one has no weapon, but you will be able to use your bow.” “Agreed. What is the name?” “Number 44, Yumi.” Psycho Pink entered the body and took control. “Perfect, and now to add the finishing touch, making the two of you my sekirei’s.” Both of them nodded and you made the two of them emerge. Needless to say, Karasuba was still very amused by your plans.
153311221111111.title: Plans For Destruction

1533112211111111.content: You began to walk away after Psycho Pink and Yellow emerged. “Where are you going?” “I’m getting a little bored, so I’m going to have some fun.” you said as you walked out the door. Once you got out of the building, you changed into Psycho Green and went off to find the source of your amusement, killing humans. Later, you found a gang who were enjoying a large amount of money that they stole. “Look at all of this dough!” “Yeah, we are stinking rich!” “You humans are such a pathetic species.” The gang looked at you. “A little early for Halloween.” one said. “You are such foolish creatures. I hope you enjoyed your life, because its over.” “Yeah, like you could kill us.” That was the last thing that one ever said. You sliced him in half with no trouble whatsoever. “Holy hell! Let’s get out of here!” he said as he ran. But you got in front of him and sliced his head off. As another one ran, you threw your dagger into his skull and as he was still standing on his lifeless feet, you chopped him right across middle. The last one you decided to be creative. You pulled out the dagger from the dead human’s skull and used your power to give this human a whole new level of pain without killing him. After giving him a nice shock with your Psycho Lightning, you wanted him to suffer more. You cut off both his hands, then his forearms, then his arm off his shoulders. Then you sliced his legs off, the same way you cut his arm off, one part at a time. Then you stabbed him multiple times in the torso with your sword. And before he died of blood loss, you crush his skull slowly and painfully. “These humans are so weak, but I will not have to deal with them for much longer.” You changed back and went back to MBI, leaving the massacre for the human authorities to find.
1533112211111111.title: Blood Bath

153312.content: You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the strongest demon slayer clans to ever exist. You are also the strongest member of the clan that ever lived, as you were the White Dino Ranger. You swore revenge against Mesogog and his forces, though it was difficult to do so. You also possessed the Dino Zords (all but the Black, Red, Yellow, and Blue ones). You thought that things in Shinto Tato would be normal, but you couldn’t have been more wrong.
153312.title: The Begining

1533121.content:
(You Hihane Benitsubasa Karasuba Zeltrax White Terrorsaur) (You wear the same outfit as Jack Atlas)

One day, you were walking through the park peacefully and just enjoying the peace for now. Not too far away, the Discipline Squad was finishing up a little assignment when Haihane felt that her Ashikabi was near. “Guys, hang on.” “What is it?” “I believe my Ashikabi is near-by.” “Really? Well, we better come along too.” The three of them went off to your location. Back with you, you were enjoying your walk. But then, the peace was interrupted by a voice filled with negative energy. “Who’s there?” “It’s good to see you again Sasuke.” a voice said as it came out of nowhere. Just then, Zeltrax, the White Terrorsaur and a large number of Tyrannodrones appeared. “You guys again?” “You will not escape this time. Tyrannodrones, attack!” In that moment, Haihane and the others arrived just in time to see you get into a fight. “I think I should help him.” “Not yet Haihane. Let’s see how strong he is.” They decided to hang back for now. You didn’t transform yet and managed to push them back, but you soon had enough of this. “Alright, time to get serious.” you said as the wristband on your right arm changed. “White Ranger, Dino Power.” In that moment, you changed into the White Ranger. “What on Earth?” “This guy is interesting to say the least.” The Tyrannodrones charged again, only this time you used your Lazer Arrows to get rid of them all at once. “You two ready to fight now?” “Let’s do this.” Zeltrax said as he and the White Terrorsaur charged at you. You charged at them and you were in a dead heat with both of them for a while. But soon, you were getting the living hell beaten out of you. Haihane couldn’t stand by any longer and charged to fight at your side. She forced them back a bit and told you to get up. For the first time in your life, you accepted the help of another person and fought alongside her. You soon managed to force them back. “We will be back.” he said as both of them left. You looked at Haihane and were about to ask who she is, but you passed out and your suit was gone. Haihane and the other members of the Discipline Squad took you a very specific hospital.
1533121.title: Dino Thunder

choices: "Why did you ran away from the hospital?"
"There's no need to get ready to fight. I'm not going to hurt you."
15331211.content: About five hours later, you woke up to find yourself in a hospital bed with your torso wrapped up in bandages. You noticed that the moon was out, meaning it was night. You then heard the doorknob jiggle a little, so you pretended to be asleep to fool the one entering. That person seemed to check your pulse and the like, then left again. Once he or she was gone, you grabbed your shirt and jacket and left the hospital out the window. You were not sure if you could trust them or not, so you had no choice but to run. Later on, Benitsubasa entered and noticed you were gone. “Hey Haihane, the guy you think is your Ashikabi is gone!” “What?” “Looks like we have a little chase on our hands.” In that moment, the three of them chased after you. Benitsubasa and Karasuba almost caught you, but you managed to avoid them with a quick burst of speed. Benitsubasa did get extrmely frustrated, being a total hothead. Eventually they lost sight of you. They needed to find you again. Though for Haihane it isn’t that hard. She just followed her gut instinct to find her Ashikabi. Eventually, she found you standing on the second highest rooftop in the city. She stood on top of the tallest roof which was next to the one you were on. By following Haihane, Karasuba and Benitsubasa made it to the same location. “Looks like we found him.” “Let’s get him already.” “No, lets wait a minute.” Karasuba then pulled out three sets of special goggles so that they could see you and get a closer look without you knowing. They then noticed you pulling out a locket (shaped like the Uchiha Crest) from the inside of your shirt. They saw you open it to reveal a picture of you, your parents and your brother when you were young. They couldn’t make out a word that you were saying, but they did see a tear run down your cheek. They couldn’t help but wonder what happened in your past, especially Haihane. Before they could stop her, Haihane jumped down right behind you. You notice this and put your locket in your shirt and get ready to fight. But then she says….
15331211.title: Waking Up

153312112.content:
(Note, in ranger form, your voice sounds like the White Ranger before he turned good)

You were not sure if you could believe this woman, being she has a set of claws on her hands. But for now, you decided to play along and see if she was trustworthy or not. “Alright, if you didn’t come for a fight, what did you come for?” you said putting your arm down. “Well for one, why did you run from the hospital?” “I have trouble trusting others. And that includes you.” “I am not sure why that is, but I can assure you that you can trust me.” “And who could prove that?” The two of you stared into each others eyes for a moment, but in that moment, you heard more commotion from another location in the city. “This will have to wait. White Ranger, Dino Power.” you said as you transformed. “You really want my trust? Earn it.” you said as you used your incredible speed to get to the location of the disturbance. When you arrived, you noticed a large number of Tyrannodrones with some kind of general. “Who are you supposed to be?” “My name is Angor and I am here to destroy you!” he said as the Tyrannodrones charged for you. “Don’t make me laugh.” You charged at them with blinding speed and slashed them by moving fast enough to use the other end of your White Drago Sword to make an ‘X’ on the torso’s of the Tyrannodrones. When you stopped, a massive slash in the shape you made on the Tyrannodrones destroyed them. “That’s got to hurt.” “You will not defeat me that easily.” “Oh really?” You once again used your incredible speed, only this time you slashed at him multiple times until he was destroyed.

-At Mesogog’s lair-
“The white ranger is getting on my nerves. We must destroy him so we do not face punishment from the master.” “Right. Activating the Hydro-Regenerator.”

-in Shinto Tato-
“Well, that was dull.” you said as you started to walk away. But then, a cloud appeared over what remained of Angor and he grew to a massive size. “I’m bigger and badder than ever white ranger!” “Now things are getting fun. DragoZord, online!” In that moment, the mighty Drago Zord tore through the night sky and caught Angor completely by surprise by slicing him with the wings with the same speed you sliced him with. Haihane, Benitsubasa, and Karasuba saw this. “What is going on here?” Just then, you jumped into the air and went inside the Drago Zord. “Now to call on another friend of mine. StegoZord, online.” Just then, the Stego-Zord came from another part of the city. “Dino StegoZord formation!” The two Zords combined as soon as you said that, creating your own MegaZord. “What kind of battle is this?” Angor wrapped you up on a powerful chain binding your arms to your body. “Looks like I got this all wrapped up!” “Oh, you got me…” you said as you began to charge your power. “Not.” You then burst out of the chains, surprising Angor and the others. “Lets end this.” you said as you had your MegaZord go into attack mode. “Dino StegoZord, Tail Attack!” Your Zord jumped high into the air and began to spin like a bike wheel, striking Angor with the tail spikes and back sails multiple times.. As Angor backed away, you decided to finish this. “Dino Stego-Lazers!” Two powerful beams shot from the eyes of your MegaZord and you looked straight down and moved your head up, when the lazers hit, Angor was completely destroyed. “What kind of Ashikabi have I found here?”
153312112.title: Drago Power

15332.content:
(You Hikari Hibiki)

You are a 18 year old man who controls the power of chaos. Though you know how to fully control your powers, you never needed to use them. One day, you were walking through the park alone enjoying your day and you decided to take a little nap on the branch of a tree. As you rested, you were being watched by two very attractive women. You could sense them and you knew they were not human. As you opened your eyes, you noticed they were wearing maid outfits for some reason. You jumped down from the tree and said to them "May I help you ladies?" "It's you. You're our Ashikabi." "Ashikabi?" "Can we go somewhere more private to talk about this?" "Alright, follow me. But do try to keep up." you said as you made a very large leap and you landed on top of a building. You were easily followed by the two girls and you led them to your home. When you all arrived, you invited them into your home and offered them some water. "Okay, so what is this whole Ashikabi business?" The girls then explained everything about the Sekirei plan and how that an Ashikabi is the person they were destined to be with. "I see. If that is the case, I will be your Ashikabi. Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Sasuke Uchiha." "I'm Hikari." "I'm Hibiki." "Hikari and Hibiki. I welcome you both as my Sekireis. By the way, you mentioned that you have not emerged yet and that I am the one who can help. Mind if I ask how?" Hikari and Hibiki the walked up to you and the first to kiss you. Hibiki followed shortly after that. They both emerged and you blushed. They were now you Sekireis. They both cuddled up to you Hikari in your right arm and Hibiki in the left one. You knew this would take some getting used to, but you had no choice in the matter.
15332.title: Hikari & Hibiki

153321.content: As you and the girls grew closer, they could sense your power and they asked you about it. "I had a feeling you two would be able to sense my power sooner or later. Come with me." You led the girls to a special training room which they thought was very impressive. "I control the power of chaos. This comes from the seven Chaos Emeralds. Each one controls a different element. Earth, fire, wind, water, darkness, ice, and lightning." "You control lightning too?" "Yes Hibiki. I have never needed to use my powers, but I train constantly. You never know when you are going to need them." "Can you show us?" "Of course. You might want to stand back." You walked to the center of the training room and pushed some kind of button. Just then a whole bunch of targets appeared. You attacked them with all the elements at your disposal, but then you got to lightning and it seemed so much stronger than before. You had a feeling that it was because of Hikari and Hibiki that your power grew so drastically. The girls were impressed by your control over lighting and then a practice dummy appeared. You then showed them your Lightning Blade, or as you called it, the Chidori. You charged at the dummy and when you made contact, a small explosion sennt you sliding backwards. The girls ran up to you and asked if you were okay. "I'm fine girls. It's just that my lightning attacks were never this strong before." "Maybe we increased its power when we became your Sekireis." "I had a feeling that was the reason for my power." You took the girls on a little tour of the house. You soon made your way into the bathroom and the girls were shocked at the size of it. It was massive. It looked more like a five star hot spring.
153321.title: A Show of Strength

1533211.content: "Yeah, I made this place myself. I did use my powers to create this place." "Mind if we have a little bath?" "Oh, sure. I'll just give you some privacy and..." you were cut off by Hikari placing her hand on your shoulder. "We mean with you." You blushed a bright red and remembered how much room there was in the place, so you agreed. You just put on some swim trunks and the girls got naked. You tained using the power of water and you were standing on the water as you did this. The girls were impressed by your power, but they think you needed to have a little fun. So without you knowing, they dove under the water and swam under you. You knew the only people in the house other than you were the girls, so you let your guard down. Just then, The girls grabbed your ankles and pulled you under the water. You were surprised, but then the girls embraced you with all their might. When you all surfaced, they began to splash you. You knew what they were just trying to loosen you up. So you decided to splash them back without your powers. This lasted for a while and then you decided to relax. Hikari and Hibiki swam into your arms and you embraced them. You were happy to be their Ashikabi and you wouldn't change this for the world.
1533211.title: In the Bath

15332111.content: After a short time in the bath, you and the girls got out and were ready to head for bed. You showed Hikari and Hibiki to the master bedroom. You got in the middle and the girls got on each side of you. You kissed both of them on the forehead and said "Good night Hikari. Good night Hibiki." "Good night Sasuke." "We are glad to have you as our Ashikabi." they both kissed you on the cheek and they fell asleep shortly after that. Before you fell asleep, you held them close to you as their heads rested on your chest. You fell asleep in a short time as well.
15332111.title: Later

153322.content:
(You) (Rantipede http://media.photobucket.com/image/Jungl...) (You look like Sasuke in Naruto Shippuden Your sword is also the same)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the strongest demon slayer clans to ever exist. You are also the strongest member of the clan that ever lived, due to your powers of chaos. You don't remember too much about your past. You swore to get revenge for your clan against the Master (of Evil) and his 10 Terrors, who were sealed away by your Mother, Father and Brother. You knew the time would soon arrive where they would rise again. Some of the minions of the underworld have already started to rise, such and the Hideaks, who were foot soldiers of the underworld. One day, you were battling the Hideaks and a general not too far from the outside of the capital city. The Hideaks were too easy, but the general was a different story. This thing was like a combination of a demon and a centipede, and his striking speed matched the animal. His claws were covered in venom, luckily you had an anti-venom ready, but not just for him, for the other four that worked for Blackheart.. The two of you clashed for quite some time, but you here gaining the upper hand. “You are getting better Sasuke, my master will be pleased that I will have destroyed you.” “Not on your life Rantipede!” you said as you sliced his chest. “You are getting better Sasuke, you might be a match for the others if you can defeat me.” “Let me tell you this, I will never lose to you, Blackheart, The Ten Terrors or the Master!” you said as you called on the power of lightning. “What?!” “Here I come!” you said as you charged at him with your sword surrounded by lightning. You then thrusted the blade forward and pierced his chest. But before he died, he managed to strike you 100 times with his poison claws. And sent you flying at the last strike. In about 30 seconds, you returned to the city and crashed into an alley. You were feeling extremely weak. You knew this was because of Rantapede’s venom. You had to act quickly. You pulled out the last anti-venom sample for Rantipede and got ready to inject it into you. But just before you could act, your body was paralyzed. "No, I can't move!" you thought to yourself. The venom was acting much faster due to the multiple strikes. You were losing consciousness and you ended up dropping the anti-venom. You thought that you were going to die then an there, but before the vaccine hit the ground, you heard someone catch it. Another person picked your body off the ground and set you against the wall. “The anti-venom…” you said weakly. “Inject it into my chest…please…” A couple of seconds later you felt a sharp pain in your chest right before you passed you.
153322.title: Chaos Begins

1533221.content:
(Hikari Hibiki)

Three hours later, you woke up and found that you were on a rooftop. Though your head was still pounding from the anti-venom. You noticed that there was a cloth on your forehead and you were wrapped in some kind of sheet. “Ugh…where…am I? How did I get up here?” You then noticed two girls jump onto the rooftop as well. They were wearing maid outfits for some reason. You tried to move, but you were still affected by the side effects of the anti-venom. “Relax. We’re not here to harm you.” “You need to rest, the venom still hasn’t worked it’s way through your body yet.” Even though you didn’t know these girls, they were right about the venom. You had no choice but to sit down and lean up against the entrance for the rooftops. It turns out that those girls were the ones taking care of you this entire time. As one of them changed the cloth on your forehead, you told them this wasn’t necessary. “No, we’re glad to do this.” “It’s no problem if we’re helping you.” “What do you mean by that?” “Well, we think that you’re our Ashikabi.” “Ashikabi?” “Yes, it means that you are, in a word, our master.” “Do you mind explaining what you two are talking about?” The girls started to explain something called the Sekirei Plan to you. They gave you all the details they knew. When you heard the words “Emerged” and “Winged” you were not sure what they meant by that, but they explained it to you as well. “Okay, most of that I get, but let me ask you this, how does a sekirei become emerged?” “Well…” “In order to emerge, we would need to have mucosal contact with you.” “Mucosal?” you thought about it for a second and as soon as you figured it out, you blushed a bright red. “Look, I appreciate all that you have done for me, believe me. But I can’t get you involved in my battles.” “Sorry to tell this to you, but it’s too late.” “Both of us truly believe that you’re our Ashikabi, and that means we were destined to be together.” You saw that they were serious and you let out a sigh. “Well, nothing I can do about it. Alright, I’ll be your Ashikabi. My name is Sasuke Uchiha.” “My name is Hikari.” “And I’m Hibiki.” Hikari was the first to lean in and kiss you. Hikari followed and both of them emerged. You knew that they too had the power of lightning at their command. It seems that the venom was out of your system now. “Listen, Hikari and Hibiki, we should head to my place now that I can move.” “Agreed.” “Lead the way.” you used the rooftops to lead the girls back to your home.
1533221.title: Meet Hikari & Hibiki

Super Robots such as: Mazinger Z, Getter Robo, Tetsujin #28, GaoGaigGar, Gurren Lagann. So that's her name." "Sasuke. I borrowed a kimono. What do you think?" "Wow. What can I say? It's like a human flower garden." "I'm so sorry. We're wearing all your clothes." "It's fine. I always like to help out where I can. My husband was the exact same way. In fact you're wearing his clothes." "Sorry." "She doesn't mean me, I'd never wear that. I'm not her husband. He passed away." "I'm sorry to hear that." "Thank you, but it's been a long time. Oh, I should introduce myself. I'm Miya, Miya Asama. Nice to met you." "Sasuke Sahashi." "I'm Musubi." "Good to meet you. I'm Kagari." "Hi, and likewise." Just then, Musubi smelled something in the air. "What's that smell?" Miya giggled a little and said "I hope it's not terrible, because I'm cooking dinner. Would you care to join us?" "But you've already done so much for us." Musubi's stomach growled and Miay giggled again. You and Musubi thanked Miya and began to eat. She was a very good cook. But then you heard footsteps and a voice saying "Oh, I'm so hungry." The door opened and a girl came in with only some kind of top and panties. The sight of this caused you to spit out some of your tea. "Oh, we have visitors." "Uzume, how many times do I tell you not to come out of your room dressed like that?" "At least I'm wearing panties this time." "Miya, I hope this doesn't sound rude, but what kind of place is this? I mean you don't look like family." "That's because this is a boarding house." "Boarding house?" Miya explained everything and you bowed your head and asked if you could stay here. She said "You poor thing. Please raise your head." "OK." "My husband, he believed in never turning anyone away." "So does that mean..." "Welcome home, to Miason Izumo." And with that, you had a new lace to live. Miya gave you all the details as well.
1551111.title: Welcome to Maison Izumo

15511111.content:
(Seo)

The next day, you knew it was time to get to your new job at the construction site. Miya gave you lunch and you went to work. It was pretty simple for you with your slightly enhanced strength, and soon it was about lunch time. A guy was staring at your lunch and you offered him some. "Really? Thanks man." He took a bite out of a rice cake and said "This tastes like..." "Like?" "So, you a college student?" "Not yet, I need to pass the entrance exams. What about you?" "Yeah, I'm in college. In my sixth year, at this rate I'll never finish. Say that chicken looks good." "Here, have some." "Thanks man." But before he could get to it, a girl in a maid outfit kicked him in the face. "Hey, what's up Hikari?" The girl scolded him and apologized to you for his behavior and you told her it was no big deal. You remembered that she was one of those lightning girls from the last time and quickly stood up and sent your lunch on the ground. But then, the other girl gave you a loaf of bread and said that it was because their master ate your lunch. "Master?" "What a surprise. Who would have thought I would have run into another Ashikabi here? I'm these girls Ashikabi, my name is Seo." You spent most of the work day getting to know Seo and you told him about your powers. But when it was time to close, Seo told you about the message about the green girl and he wanted you to come along. "OK, let's go. But how will we get in? I do not know how to control my powers yet." "Well, leave that to me." He had his Sekirei attack the MBI guards and went into the front gate and you followed him.
15511111.title: The Green Girl

155111111.content:
(Kusano) (Your outfit http://evilsetokaiba.deviantart.com/art/...)

You and Seo searched the forest with no idea where to start looking. But then, the little girl showed up and pointed to her location. She disappeared and then you and Sea began to walk towards her hiding place. But along the way, Seo told you how to make a Sekirei emerge, through mucosal contact. Or in other words, kissing. But after a while, you had the feeling that she was in danger, so you rushed to get to her as fast as you could. You saw that she was about to be cut by a Sekirei with a giant scythe. You grabbed her to make sure she didn't harm Kusano. Hikari an Hibiki attacked her, but you got fried as well. "Geez, they're not much help are they?" "Big brother?" "We finally meet." "Please, help me" she said before passing out and falling into your arms. "Ku!" But then the Sekirei attacked but before the scythe could hit you, Musubi showed up and broke the scythe. "What are you doing here?" "I came to bring you this." she said handing you your cell phone. But then, Yomie attacked again and they began to fight, but thatnks to Yomie, she only had her panties and shoes left. She then took MIya's advise when they were training and she defeated Yomie. "Musubi! Are you alright?" "Yep. I told you I wouldn't lose. And I protected my modesty." "I'm not so sure about that." you thought to yourself. When you and Musubi got home, you hand Ku on your back and you told Miya that she was a relitive of yours that was suddenly placed in your care. She slowly woke up after that. "Hey Ku." "Where are we? I'm hungry." "Oh you poor thing. I'll go make something for you to eat right away." You and Ku were sitting on the porch telling her that you first saw her when you were falling the other night. Ku told you it was her who asked the tree to help you. "Well, I guess Musubi and I both owe our lives to you and this tree. Let me just say thank you very much Ku." "Um, big brother? Will you do me a favor? Will you be my Ashikabi?" she said as she kissed you. Kusano was made your second Sekirei and flowers began to grow around you. The next day, you decided to get yourself a new outfit and you went alone. Later that day, you came into the house with your ew outfit. Musubi liked it and so did Ku.
155111111.title: Your Second Sekirei

1551111111.content:
(Matsu Tsukiumi)

The next day, you knew that there was another person besides the people you met in the house. But you decided to wait it out for a while. When Musubi went to get some groceries, you went to the bath and before you knew it, another Sekirei showed up. Her name was Matsu and she was about to make you her Ashikabi when Musubi came in and she shot some kind synthetic fiber net at her. Myia showed up and stopped her from kissing you being sexual relations being forbiden and all. But later on that night, she was your third Sekirei and Miya caught her in the act. The next morning, all of you were eating breakfast and you decided to train for a while. You still did not know how to call on your powers, but you tried for a while before resting. But when you fell asleep you had a dream like the one you had when you first met Ku. "Wait, who are you?" "At last I have found you. I hope you're prepared Ashikabi, for death!" You woke up and then went to Matsu. She then found out that her name was Tsukiumi. "Tsukiumi, Sekirei #9. A water Sekirei, famous for her intense hatred of Ashikabi. If she's reacting to your power, then it seems you damaged her pride and made her angry." She, Musubi, and Ku came up with a plan to find her. Ku went with you to keep an eye out for you. But soon a cat was falling from a rooftop when Ku caught it by using the plant in the small flower pot she had with her. Seo showed up and told you about the cat being a lost pet. He could also tell you had Matsu as a Sekirei. And speaking of which, it did not take long for Tsukiumi to find you as Matsu predicted.
1551111111.title: The Third Sekirei and the dream.

15511111111.content: You led Tsukiumi into a very large alley to keep any innocent people from getting hurt. But you were quickly forced against a wall. "Wait! Just listen to me!" "Not on thy life. Water..." She was cut off when Ku got in front of you "Ku!" "Stop it. I won't let you bully my big brother!" She said as a few large trees appeared and filled the alley. "No. You can't fight with her! Because if you defeat her in battle, she'll get taken away Ku. We need her." Ku stood down. "Thank you. Good job." "It's a child. But why is she... You despicable fiend! Thou has sank thy claws into a child?" "Claws?" "Fifthly man, what thou needs is a shower. Water Celebration!" She then slammed you into the wall with her water attack. "Weakling. I only used a modicum of the power I possess. Before I give thee another taste of it, to what did thou want me to listen?" "I want you to be my... no wait I need you to be my Sekirei." "Wait, what was that?" Seo and his Sekirei were watching the entire thing. "Have I gone mad, or didst thou just request me to be thy Sekirei?" "Yes, I did. I.. I mean, we need your power." "How can the so shameless in public?" "Shameless?" "As much as I despise thee, I thought to spare thy life. But now..." "Yeah?" "I will destroy thee!" She charged up her power and shot another powerful water attack at you. But she missed and Ku ran up to you. "Big brother!" "I let my anger cloud my aim. I shall not be so careless with the next shot." "Go ahead then. I'm not moving until you listen to me. I'm begging you!" She then grabbed her chest and then got ready to attack again. But then, Seo's Sekirei asked Seo to unlock their special power known as God's Song. They attacked Tsukiumi and you used your body to take the blow. "Why wouldst thou?" "Are you OK?" "This man, he protected me with his own body." she thought to herself. She then went on the counter attack but ended up hitting Seo and made him loose the cat. "Hey you!" He then landed on the tree where Tsukiumi was and pinned her against the tree. He then threatened to make her his Sekirei. "Seo!" "What?" "Please, let her go. If not I will fight you for her. Because.. It's because... she's MY Sekirei!" Seo let her go, but then was given a painful jolt by his own Sekirei. Tsukiumi landed in front of you. "Monkey. I heard. Thou called me 'My Sekirei' did thou not?" You nodded. "Then thou must take the responsibility." "Um, of what?" Then she doused you with water. "Do not jest! Thou said I was thy Sekirei correct?" "Yes, ma'am! I did." "Thou hast courage. Not only didst thou protect me with thy own flesh, but also from that vile Ashikabi over there." "Not really." For a monkey, thou are a man of metal. It’s strange. But my heart which once clamored so loudly with protest, is surprisingly at peace now. What is thy name?” “Sasuke. Sasuke Sahashi." "Thank you." "Look, I know we don't know each other. But please be my Sekirei! I saw you in my dreams for a reason we were meant to be together. I.. I need you." Tsukiumi gasped lightly. "Thou has said enough now. Very well then. The Sekirei Tsukiumi, will graciously acccept thy proposal of marriage." “Marriage proposal!?” She grabbed you by the collar of your shirt and said angrily “You did call me thy Sekirei right?” "Yes, ma'am I guess I did I'm sorry." "Sasuke, there is only one person who shall kill thee, from this day forward, and that’s me.” She kissed you and as she emerged, she though to herself "What? What is this? This feeling rising from my heart, it's so warm and strong. So this is emergence." She then walked away from you a little bit. " Excuse me, ma'am" "Thou may dispense with the formalities and address me as Tsukiumi. Thou aret my Ashikabi after all, as well as my husband." You smiled at this, but you knew there would be a battle for your heart in the future.
15511111111.title: The Water Sekirei
